name: Saul G \- \#hashtag \(feat\. Metth\) \[3D Animated Music Video\]
metadata: {"name": "Saul G - #hashtag (feat. Metth) [3D Animated Music Video] #1","description": "Continuing his Turkish G funk works without slowing down, Saul G meets music lovers with his entertaining work #hashtag, accompanied by Metth, one of the important names of RedKeys Music. Emphasizing living in the moment and having fun, the song also draws attention with its adequate sound embellished with west coast motifs. The mixing and mastering processes of the work produced by Charaf Beatz bear the signature of Barry Allen (Khontkar). The strong collaboration of Saul G and Metth #hashtag was released on all digital music platforms as of May 19, 2023.\n\nThe duo brings life to the NFT characters of Futureverse, where they introduce PartyBear NFT characters as Saul Bear and Metth Bear in their latest track, b�#hashtag.b� In this work, the artists animated their NFT characters in the music video as their characters with unique visual aspects attributable to their personalities and vibe. Wipe3d performed the artwork of the song, 3D visuals, and animation.","image": "ar://sjsjb-__IegccLghjbp-7VlgTFlW1r5YGH-D4iyH_lI","animation_url": "ar://dCFCfi3uPf6aN7Uq5IrpiPQaMpcP3tjo3DcSb9xokZ4","external_url": "https://glass.xyz/play/bCfgl3P1sQ4="}
